page.title: 17CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: CHILDREN PLAY A GREAT MANY DIFFERENT GAMES IN THE PLAYGROUND. SOME OF THEM ARE VERY OLD. {STICKY TOFFEE.}SEVERAL PEOPLE CAN PLAY THIS GAME. ONE OF YOU IS 'IT'. THEY CHASE THE OTHER UNTIL ONE IS CAUGHT. THE CATCHER SAYS'STICKY TOFFEE' AND THE NEW PERSON IS 'IT'. OTHER GAMES INCLUDE SEA SHELLS-A SKIPPING GAME, ELASTIC OR FRENCH SKIPPING, WHERE A LONG LOOP OF ELASTIC IS STRETCHED BETWEEN TWO PEOPLE AT INCREASING HEIGHTS AND A THIRD PERSON HAS TO JUMP OVER THE ELASTIC IN A PARTICULAR WAY. FOOTBALL, NETBALL, CATCH AND MANY OTHER BALL GAMES ARE PLAYED. {RADIO}THE PERSON WHO IS 'IT' THINKS OF A POP GROUP AND SINGS ONE OF THEIR SONGS. THE OTHERS HAVE TO GUESS THE NAME OF THE GROUP. OTHER GAMES INCLUDE QUEENY, MOTHER MAY AND ICE CREAM.
